headline: Groovy Baby! CloudFlare's London Data Center Now Online
keywords: Europe, Data Center, United Kingdom, Cloudflare Network
description: As our network map will soon indicate, CloudFlare's London (LHR) data center is now online. The team started routing traffic through it this beginning at 12:13 GMT. We're already doing more than 1Gbps of traffic through LHR, most of which would previously have been routed to Amsterdam.
